gov.lanl.adore.djatoka

Interface ICompress

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    KduCompressExe

    public interface ICompress
    Abstract compression interface. Allows use of common input method (e.g. String path, InputStream, BufferedImage) and output methods. The underlying implementations are responsible for handling these variants.
    Author:
    Ryan Chute

        void compressImage(java.lang.String input,
                 java.lang.String output,
                 DjatokaEncodeParam params)
                   throws DjatokaException
        Compress input using provided DjatokaEncodeParam parameters.
        Parameters:
        input - absolute file path for input file.
        output - absolute file path for output file.
        params - DjatokaEncodeParam containing compression parameters.
        Throws:
        DjatokaException
